name: query_horses
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool horse_racing.
Tool description: Horse racing API - UK & Ireland races. Racecards, results, stats, Odds comparator and more. 
API description: Search horses by name. 
Once you get "*id_horse*" from this query, you can get horses stats from "**Horse stats**" endpoint.

name.description: The name of the horse to search for. Must be a minimum of 3 characters.
